A1 the number 20: nineteen, twenty, twenty-one space for twenty people See also
score noun (TWENTY)
More examplesFewer examplesIt takes me twenty minutes to get to work.I found a twenty pence piece in the phone booth.She practised medicine for twenty years before she became a writer.She was only twenty when she had her first baby.If I look flustered it's because I'm trying to do about twenty things at once.
